source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Everyone is so...carefree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>相変わらず、ここの連中は、皆のうのうと生きているな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Unafraid and unconcerned in spite of their weakness, and how easily their lives could be torn apart in an instant...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ろくに戦えもしない、片手で捻り潰せそうな弱者だ。
なのに、あんなにも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Such luxuries are lost to us. We have no hopes or dreams─not even the release of death. Only hunger.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私たちは、ああいう眩しいものを失くした。
夢や希望……何もないのに死の静穏さえ得られず、
餓えるがままに貪り続けている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Others are a means to an end. At times a literal one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だからこそ、他者のことは、
喰っていくのに有益か、そうでないかで判別するんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We forge covenants with men, and come here to feed. Or to die.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>わざわざ、こっちの世界に渡ってくるのだって同じこと。
エーテルを求めるか、あるいは命巡るこの場所で、
死という結末を得るために契約を結ぶ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I thought it would be no different when I was summoned by Zenos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>それがすべてで、それが普通だ。
……ゼノスの奴に喚び出されたときも、私はそう思っていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Lives were tools to him, to be used and discarded at whim. In that respect, he was a voidsent at heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>あいつとファダニエルは、妖異と同じだったからな。
目的を果たすため、互いを利用しあっていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But towards you and you alone, he behaved...differently. And I cannot fathom why.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>なのに、お前に対してだけ、何か違う理屈を持っていて……
私はそれが理解できなかったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What was it that drove him? What made him choose such an end?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>あいつの中に渦巻いていたものが何だったのか……。
どうして、あんな最期を選んだのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But enough about that man. He is dead, and we are all better for it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……いや、奴のことを考えるのはやめだ。
あのいけ好かない顔を思い浮かべるだけで、虫唾が走る。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why are you here? Was there something you needed?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前だって、
そんなことのために私を呼びにきたわけじゃないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So you're heading back now. Then as per our bargain, I will go as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>戻るんだな、再びあの世界へ。
……なら、契約どおりに行くとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000130_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Everyone is here? Good. Let us set forth for the void once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000130_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>皆、揃ったようだな。
では、再び向かうとしよう。
姉さんが待つ、ヴォイドへ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>おい、出発するんじゃないのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>He's...calling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>これは、竜の咆哮……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000160_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What is the meaning of this...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000160_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>いったい、どういうことだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Unless I'm mistaken, that was intended for one of your kin. Who?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>聞きたいのはこちらの方よ。
竜の咆哮は魔力を乗せて、遠方の同族まで届く……。
あなた、誰に対して咆哮を？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000180_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>It was for the briefest of moments, but...I felt her. Azdaja.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000180_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>一瞬だが、感じたのだ……。
この世界に、姉さんの反応を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000190_ESTINIEN<tab>I thought she was in the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000190_ESTINIEN<tab>アジュダヤは、ヴォイドにいるはずだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000200_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As did I. Yet the presence was unmistakable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000200_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>そのはずだ。
だが、姉さんのエーテルを間違えるはずがない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000210_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thus did I call out...only for it to fade and vanish.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000210_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>咄嗟に咆哮を上げて呼びかけたが……
すでに姉さんの反応は消失している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000220_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps...she crossed over to the Source then immediately turned back?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000220_YSHTOLA<tab>原初世界に帰還し、
またすぐに第十三世界に渡ったということ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I do not know...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>わからない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000240_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Could she have found a way home...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000240_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>本当にこの世界へ帰ってきたのか？
しかし、どうやって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>The how of it aside, if she was indeed in the Source, there may be clues where she came through that could lead us back to her.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>この際、方法は問題じゃないわ。
一時的にでも、原初世界に姿を現したのなら、
周辺にアジュダヤの居所に繋がる痕跡が残っているはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000260_YSHTOLA<tab>Where exactly was it that you felt her presence?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000260_YSHTOLA<tab>反応があったのはどこ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000270_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Far to the north. That was all I could discern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000270_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>あの一瞬では、はるか遠い北の方、としか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000280_ESTINIEN<tab>The north, you say? Beyond the Bounty─Garlemald?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000280_ESTINIEN<tab>北か……。
ガレマルドにいる連中なら、
何か異変に気づいているかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>As good a place to start as any.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>そうね。
急ぎ情報を集めて、場所を特定しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000300_YSHTOLA<tab>My apologies, Zero, but your return to the void will have to wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000300_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたには悪いけれど、
第十三世界に帰してあげられるのは、そのあとになりそうだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I told you before that I have no reason to go back there. Do as you will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>構わない。
あの世界に戻りたい理由があるわけでもないからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>...All right. I presume you wish to stay here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han until we return?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>……そう。
じゃあ、私たちが帰るまで、
ラザハンで待っていてもらえるかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You've kept me amply fed. I wouldn't be averse to helping you on your search.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>こちら側に来てから、
ずいぶんとエーテルを馳走になった。
探し物ぐらいなら、手を貸してやってもいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>If Azdaja was indeed here, other voidsent may have made the journey as well...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>アジュダヤの反応があったということは、
ヴォイド側で、何かが起こっている可能性もあるか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well, we would welcome your company.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>わかったわ。
あなたも一緒に来て頂戴。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000360_ESTINIEN<tab>If it's decided, then I'll contact our associates in Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000360_ESTINIEN<tab>ガレマルドなら、まずは「あいつら」をあたるか。
捨てずに取っておいたリンクパールが、やっと役立ちそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000370_ESTINIEN<tab>...It's me. Still talking everyone's ears off, I trust?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000370_ESTINIEN<tab>俺だ……ああ、そうだ。
お前たちに聞きたいことがあってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000380_ESTINIEN<tab>Understood. We'll see you there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000380_ESTINIEN<tab>そうか、わかった。
そこで待っていろ。
すぐに向かう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000390_ESTINIEN<tab>We're to rendezvous at Tertium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000390_ESTINIEN<tab>「情報提供者」とテルティウム駅で落ち合うことになった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000400_ESTINIEN<tab>We'll need to teleport to make it there in time. Can you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000400_ESTINIEN<tab>俺たちは転移魔法で向かえばいいが、お前はどうする。
徒歩で行ける距離じゃないぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. I know it well from my time as an avatar.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>転移魔法なら、私も使える。
加えてガレマルドなら、知らない土地じゃない。
……あいつが居座ってた場所だろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000420_ESTINIEN<tab>Then it seems we're all set.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000420_ESTINIEN<tab>なるほど、心配するまでもなかったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>If there is nothing else, let us see to our final preparations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>なら、準備が整い次第、出発しましょう。
目指すは「テルティウム駅」よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>Any moment now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>さて、これでこちらはそろったが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>My friends, 'tis good to see you again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-？？？？-)やあ。
皆、しばらくぶりだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>And you. I was worried that the cold wouldn't agree with you, but you're both looking quite well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>久しぶりね。
寒さで体調を崩してないかと案じていたけれど、
ふたりとも、元気そうじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000470_ALISAIE<tab>You get used to it. It helps that there's no shortage of fuel and heaters like before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000470_ALISAIE<tab>ええ、すっかり慣れちゃったわ！
前よりはずっと、暖をとりやすくなったしね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000480_YSHTOLA<tab>Glad to hear it. Have you been working in Garlemald all this time?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000480_YSHTOLA<tab>何よりだわ。
ずっとここで支援活動を続けていたの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have. Though the worst is behind them, the people still have a long road ahead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ、終末という災厄が去ってからも、
依然としてこの地に生きる人々は厳しい状況にある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000500_ALPHINAUD<tab>They've taken steps towards forming an interim government, but it will be some time before any large-scale reconstruction effort can be carried out in earnest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000500_ALPHINAUD<tab>暫定政権の樹立に向けて動き出してはいるが、
ガレマルドの復興は容易いことじゃないからね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>With the nation in ruins and the leadership void yet to be filled, there remains a lack of direction─a pervasive sense of aimlessness and worry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>指導者を失い、国としての機能も保てなくなってから、
彼らは心の拠り所を失ったままだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000520_ALISAIE<tab>So we'll keep doing what we can until they can finally stand on their own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000520_ALISAIE<tab>私たちにできることで、
精一杯、協力させてもらっているの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000530_ALISAIE<tab>Still, everyone wants to make things better, and we're here to help.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000530_ALISAIE<tab>それでも、現状をどうにかしたいって思いは、
みんな多かれ少なかれ抱いてる。
その一部でも手助けができれば、ってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000540_ALISAIE<tab>A lot of Garleans wanted nothing to do with us, but they're starting to come around. Slowly but surely.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000540_ALISAIE<tab>もちろん、はじめは私たちのことを拒絶する人もいたわ。
けれど今では、少しずつ、
一緒に頑張ろうと手を取ってくれる人も増えてきたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're doing a fine job.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ふたりも、よくがんばってる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It sounds like quite the undertaking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>大変なことが多そうだ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>You're too kind. But it's thanks to the cooperation of like-minded souls that we've been able to make any progress.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>ありがとう。
けれど、同じ想いを抱く同志がいてくれるから、
どうにか前に進めているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, it has not been easy. But we've been able to make progress thanks to the cooperation of like-minded souls.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>何の苦労もないとは言わないさ。
同じ想いを抱く同志の協力なくしては、
この活動を続けていくことはできなかっただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>The allied nations continue to send supplies which allow us to meet basic needs such as food and shelter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>派遣団を通じて、各国から支援物資が続々と届いている。
そのおかげで、餓えて倒れるような状況は脱することができた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Meanwhile, Jullus and a number of soldiers have begun a restoration initiative, with more and more volunteers joining by the day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>それに、ユルスを中心とした有志の帝国兵も、
復興に向けた取り組みに、参加してくれているからね。
国境や種族を越えた協力の輪が広がっているのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000590_ALISAIE<tab>Like Alphinaud said, they've got a long road ahead of them. But we'll get there together─one step at a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000590_ALISAIE<tab>まだまだ、道半ばだけど……
一歩ずつ、たしかに前に向かっているわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though you yourself helped them take one especially big step, didn't you? In vanquishing that blasphemy in the Tower of Babil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>君こそ、この地に現れた偽神獣を倒してくれたんだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you. I can only hope that your deed will help the people to find peace and closure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>感謝するよ。
絶望の原因そのものがなくなったわけではなくとも、
脅威となる存在が払われたことは大きい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000620_ALISAIE<tab>But enough about events here. What brings you to us? And with new company besides.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000620_ALISAIE<tab>それで、みんなはなんでここに？
見たところ、初対面の人もいるじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>This may take rather a long time to explain, but bear with me...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>どこまで手短にできるかわからないけれど、
説明するわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000640_ALISAIE<tab>The Thirteenth!? After traveling to the edge of existence, I thought you'd keep your escapades closer to home for a while...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000640_ALISAIE<tab>宇宙の果てに行ってきたばかりだっていうのに、
今度は第十三世界！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000650_ALISAIE<tab>But I suppose there's no stopping you. Not that I'm one to talk, of course...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000650_ALISAIE<tab>本当、じっとしていられないというか、
どこまでも突き進んでいっちゃうんだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>The heart of an adventurer cannot be denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>彼は冒険者なんだから、仕方ないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>The heart of an adventurer cannot be denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>彼女は冒険者なんだから、仕方ないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000680_ALISAIE<tab>You could have at least invited me too! Surely there was room enough for me and G'raha in the undersea vault?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000680_ALISAIE<tab>それはそうだけど！
もっと早く頼ってくれたってよかったじゃない。
……ラハは海底遺跡に連れていったのに！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sorry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ごめん、アリゼー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were busy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>邪魔したら悪いと思って……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000690_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, it's fine. You can make it up to me on the next one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000690_ALISAIE<tab>謝るよりも、今後の改善に期待するわ。
そのうちに、また一緒にどこかへ出かけましょ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000700_ALISAIE<tab>I know, I know. I only meant to tease. Mostly...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000700_ALISAIE<tab>もう、わかってるわよ！
私たちのことを気遣ってくれたんだ、ってことくらいね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>But on a more serious note... Are we sure it's wise to keep Zenos's former avatar around?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>それにしても、
ゼノスが使役していた妖異だったんでしょう？
その……大丈夫なわけ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000720_ALISAIE<tab>I understand how you came to work together, but nevertheless...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000720_ALISAIE<tab>あなたや、ヤ・シュトラが平気だって判断したんだから、
悪いものじゃないんでしょうけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're right to be cautious. I'm a voidsent after all. But do not conflate me with Zenos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前が警戒するのは当然だ。
だが、ゼノスと同一視されるのは御免こうむる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To recall my time in his service─it...angers me...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>あの男に使役されていたときのことを思い出すだけで、
はらわたが煮えくりかえりそうになるんでな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Is that so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000750_ALISAIE<tab>ふぅーん？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>I think we'll get along just fine, you and I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>どうやら、あなたとは仲良くやれそうだわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000770_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Now that we are all caught up, to the matter at hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000770_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>事情の説明が終わったところで、
すまないが、私から君たちに聞きたいことがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As we were about to resume our search in the void, I felt the presence of my sister Azdaja in the Source. Somewhere in the far north─perhaps even here in Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>イルサバード大陸の北部、つまりガレマルドの方向より、
我が姉アジュダヤの反応を感じたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If you have seen or heard anything out of the ordinary, I must know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>どんな細かいことでも構わない。
何か気づいたことはないだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>As a matter of fact, we may have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>第十三世界に消えたはずの竜の痕跡……。
そういうことであれば、思い当たる異変がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>In recent days, we have had to contend with a surprising number of voidsent. And not the lesser kind that occasionally manifest, but ones possessed of considerable power.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>実はここ数日、この近辺で妖異の出現が確認されているんだ。
それも、自然に現れるような低級な個体ではなく、
力を持った妖異が、かなりの数ね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>You think they might have been summoned? By whom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>……誰か、妖異を召喚するような手勢に、心当たりは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're not sure. But as Jullus reminded us, practitioners of a certain traditional Garlean art rely upon voidsent servants.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>異変を受けてユルスが教えてくれたのだが、
かつてこの国でも、妖異を使役しようという試みがあったらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>The very same I believe you have mastered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>まさに君は、その技をどこかで継承したようだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>While there are no known reapers left in Garlemald, we can't rule out the possibility that some are working in secret.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>とはいえ、少なくとも現在のガレマルドでは、
そうした技は途絶え、妖異召喚を行える者はいないそうだ。
生き残りがいた可能性も、なくはないが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000860_ESTINIEN<tab>To summon not one, but several powerful voidsent, is no small feat. But if Azdaja was indeed called from the void...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000860_ESTINIEN<tab>力ある妖異を何体も呼び出すとなると、
生半可な労力じゃないんだろう？
ましてや七大天竜ほどの存在となれば……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Then it is likely the same party is responsible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>思いつきでやれるようなことではないわね。
当然、自然発生するヴォイドクラックという線もあり得ないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>Alternatively, the aetheric confluence at the Tower of Babil may have triggered an expansion of natural fissures one could use to cross over, but I think that improbable if not impossible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>「バブイルの塔」が世界規模でエーテルを吸い上げていた影響で、
クラックが拡張されてしまった可能性も、皆無ではないけれど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000890_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Then we must assume these events have indeed been orchestrated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000890_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>何者かがゲートを開いたと考える方が、まだ妥当というわけか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Well, summoned or no, we've been trying to track them to their origin. It's the mountains to the east, we think.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000900_ALISAIE<tab>ひとまず、妖異たちがどこからやってくるのか、
私たちも調べてみることにしたの。
東の山岳部の方だろうってことまでは判明したわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000910_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Can you guide us there?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000910_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ならば、すぐに現地へ向かおう。
ヴォイドゲートや、その痕跡を見つけられるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>I would, but the terrain is too difficult to traverse on foot. Nor is flying an option due to the winds.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>残念だが、あの雪山を徒歩で登るのは厳しい。
おまけに、上空は強風が吹きつけていて、
飛空艇を飛ばすのも難しいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Too much ground to cover in any case. Is there no way to narrow it down?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>捜索範囲も曖昧すぎる。
もう少し絞ることはできないのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is one place we thought to look first: an isolated village rumored to have once been home to a reaper order.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>それについては、一旦の候補地を出していてね。
東の山岳部には、先ほど話に上がった、
妖異を使役していた者たちの隠れ里があるらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>That would indeed make an excellent start. Though the question of how to get there remains.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>確かに、ヴォイドとの接点という意味では、
真っ先にそこを調べてみるのがよさそうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus may be of assistance. Let us return to Camp Broken Glass and consult him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>そう言ってもらえるなら、移動手段の確保に移ろう。
キャンプ・ブロークングラスで任務中のユルスを訪ねて、
助言をもらうんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000970_ALISAIE<tab>What was it you wished to talk about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000970_ALISAIE<tab>それで、私に聞きたいことって？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why do you help these people?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……お前たちは何が目的で、
この地の復興に手を貸している？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What is it that you stand to gain?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>弱い者を助けることで、
お前たちに何の利益があるんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001000_ALISAIE<tab>I'm sorry?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001000_ALISAIE<tab>何の利益って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You don't act on behalf of a higher power, nor are you bound by a contract. In spite of this, you help them. Why?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前は、他者から命令を受けているわけでも、
使役されているわけでもないんだろう。
なのに、なぜわざわざ苦労を背負おうとする？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001020_ALISAIE<tab>And there I thought it was something serious...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001020_ALISAIE<tab>なんだ、改まって聞かれたから、身構えちゃったじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001030_ALISAIE<tab>I help them because I want to. Because it's the right thing to do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001030_ALISAIE<tab>そんなの決まってる。
私があの人たちのために、頑張りたいって思ったからよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...But what do you stand to gain? You didn't answer the question.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……答えになってない。
どんな利益があるから頑張るのかと聞いている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001050_ALISAIE<tab>Didn't I? I followed my heart. What I got out of it came after.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001050_ALISAIE<tab>答えてるわよ。
頑張りたいって気持ちが先で、それで何が得られたかなんて、
大抵はあとあとの結果論だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001060_ALISAIE<tab>Was there anything else? If not, let's keep moving.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001060_ALISAIE<tab>聞きたいことはそれだけだった？
なら、先を急ぎましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>あ、ああ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To act not out of obligation or in pursuit of gain. To simply...live. And they survive like this...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>頑張りたい……利益がないとしても……
そんな理由で行動しても、やっていけるのか……？
この世界では……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001090_ALISAIE<tab>All finished, are we? Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001090_ALISAIE<tab>こっちも、今終わったところ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001100_ALISAIE<tab>The cold doesn't let up out here, does it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001100_ALISAIE<tab>相変わらず、ここは寒いわよね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001110_ALISAIE<tab>They've the means to keep everyone warm at Camp Broken Glass and Tertium. But the measures are still only temporary.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001110_ALISAIE<tab>テルティウム駅や、キャンプ・ブロークングラスでは、
この冷たい風を避けることができる。
でも、それは一時しのぎにすぎないの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Subsisting on charity, dreading the day the sympathy of others is exhausted─it's no way to live. They need lasting safety and security.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001120_ALISAIE<tab>支援の打ち切りに怯えずに、寒さから身を護れる環境……
前にユルスが話してたような、あたたかい「家」を、
もう一度ガレマルドに作らないといけないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001130_ALISAIE<tab>Though things will never be as they once were...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001130_ALISAIE<tab>もちろん、すべてを元どおりにできるわけじゃないけど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001140_ALISAIE<tab>If we can restore a modicum of normalcy to their lives, maybe that will be enough for them to move forward.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001140_ALISAIE<tab>でも、そういう場所があれば、
起こったことをゆっくりと受け止めて、
先のことを考えていけるようにもなると思うから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001150_ALISAIE<tab>If we're to achieve that, we have to work harder. I have to work harder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001150_ALISAIE<tab>そのためには、動ける私たちが、
もっと頑張らなくちゃね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're doing your best. Anyone can see that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アリゼーは頑張ってるよ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Just try not to overdo it, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>無理しすぎないように

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001160_ALISAIE<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001160_ALISAIE<tab>っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001170_ALISAIE<tab>L-Lest you misunderstand, I wasn't fishing for a compliment... As I said, I'm doing this because I want to.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001170_ALISAIE<tab>な、なによ突然……
言ったでしょ、これは私がやりたくてやってることなの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001180_ALISAIE<tab>Still...I appreciate your support.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001180_ALISAIE<tab>でも……ありがとね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001190_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, come now, you think I don't know my own limits?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001190_ALISAIE<tab>し、してないわよ！
無理とか無茶とか、そんなの、全然……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001200_ALISAIE<tab>Still...I appreciate your concern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001200_ALISAIE<tab>でも……心配してくれて、ありがとね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001210_ALISAIE<tab>Well, our work here is done. We should be heading back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001210_ALISAIE<tab>さてと！
目撃情報のあった妖異は倒したし、
テルティウム駅に戻りましょ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001220_ALISAIE<tab>I hope Alphinaud and Zero haven't gotten into any trouble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001220_ALISAIE<tab>アルフィノとゼロも、無事に到着したかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001230_ALISAIE<tab>I cannot imagine how awful it must have been to serve as Zenos's avatar. To not only suffer him, but so much else...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001230_ALISAIE<tab>ゼノスと契約した妖異が、まさかあんな子だったなんて。
ヴォイドから世界を渡ってきたんですもの。
いろいろ背負ってるとは思うけど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001240_ALISAIE<tab>She's a fighter all right. Like you and me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001240_ALISAIE<tab>うん、やっぱり仲良くやれそうな気がするわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001250_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, at Tertium...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001250_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方  テルティウム駅――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001260_HUNGARYGARLEAN10320<tab>Thank you, miss. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001260_HUNGARYGARLEAN10320<tab>いただくわ、ありがとうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This feels...strangely familiar...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ありがとう、か……。
ひどく懐かしい響きだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001280_RESTLESSGARLEAN10320<tab>Excuse me, Alphinaud. My wife, she's come down with a high fever. Do you think you could take a look at her?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001280_RESTLESSGARLEAN10320<tab>アルフィノ君。
妻が熱を出してしまってね。
すまないが、看てやってくれないだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. Give me a moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>わかりました。
すぐ伺います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Zero, may I leave the rest here to you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>すまないが、ここは君に任せてもいいかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Fine by me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ああ。
この程度のことなら、問題はない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001320_JULLUS<tab>Thank you again for your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001320_JULLUS<tab>手伝い、助かる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001330_JULLUS<tab>Er...Zero, was it? I take it you're one of Alphinaud's comrades?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001330_JULLUS<tab>ゼロだったよな。
お前も、アルフィノたちの仲間なのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Comrade...? We've entered into a cooperative pact, if that's what you mean.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>仲間……
それは利害に基づいた共闘関係かと聞いているのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001350_JULLUS<tab>Pact? No, no, nothing so formal. What I mean is, you must know each other well. Be on good terms, enjoy each other's company─that sort of thing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001350_JULLUS<tab>共闘……いや、ええと……
同じ組織の所属だったのかとか、そうでなくても、
あいつらによく付き合ってる仲なのかって意味だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then no, he's not my comrade. I have none. Nor will I ever, I think.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だとすれば、私に仲間はいない。
これまでも……そして、これからもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001370_JULLUS<tab>Oh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001370_JULLUS<tab>……そうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Did I say something odd?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>なにかおかしいか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001390_JULLUS<tab>No, not at all. On the contrary, it makes sense.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001390_JULLUS<tab>いいや……。
どちらかというと、納得した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001400_JULLUS<tab>When Alphinaud and the contingent first arrived, we rejected them out of hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001400_JULLUS<tab>俺も含め、ガレマルドの住民は、
あいつらがやって来たとき相当反発したんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001410_JULLUS<tab>Whatever they may have claimed, they were the enemy. Savages with their savage ways. To accept their help was to admit defeat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001410_JULLUS<tab>どんな大義名分を掲げていたって、
国籍や種族が違う、考え方も違う、遺恨だってある……
そんな連中と手を取り合うのは、敗北と同じだとすら思ってた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001420_JULLUS<tab>But no matter how poorly we treated them, they didn't turn their backs on us. They stayed and listened.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001420_JULLUS<tab>だから拒絶して……
なのに、あいつらときたら、俺たちの話を聞こうとしたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001430_JULLUS<tab>That's just the kind of people they are. Makes sense they'd get along with someone like you, who tries to push others away.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001430_JULLUS<tab>そういう連中だったら、
お前みたいに他人を遠ざけようとしてる奴とだって、
上手くやれるんだろうな……と思ったわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Get along? I'm upholding my part of the bargain. There's nothing more to it than that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>わからないな。
私はただ、契約に基づいてここにいるだけだ。
それは当然のことであって、「上手くやっている」じゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001450_JULLUS<tab>If you say so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001450_JULLUS<tab>まあ、そうかもしれないが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001460_JULLUS<tab>Ah, I'd nearly forgotten why I came. Are you hungry?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001460_JULLUS<tab>っと、用件を忘れるところだった。
……お前、腹は減ってないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001470_JULLUS<tab>We all get rations, and considering the work you're doing, you're as good as one of us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001470_JULLUS<tab>民間人はもちろんだが、俺たちにだって食料は配給される。
仕事を手伝ってくれてるからには、お前にも……
よければ食べてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I am running low on aether... Very well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>確かに、体内のエーテルは少し減っているな。
補給させてもらうとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001490_JULLUS<tab>Azim Steppe-style dumplings. Buuz, they call them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001490_JULLUS<tab>派遣団が提供してくれた品だ。
アジムステップの、ボーズとかいう……
蒸したピロシキみたいな食い物だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001500_JULLUS<tab>Never had a dumpling? It's like...a kind of bread stuffed with a filling─meat or vegetables usually─that you bake or steam.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001500_JULLUS<tab>ピロシキは、その、
肉や野菜を生地で包んで焼いたり揚げたりしたものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001510_JULLUS<tab>We have our own recipes in Garlemald, too. My mother liked to make them. My brother and sister always fought over the jam-filled ones...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001510_JULLUS<tab>ガレマルドでは、どこの家でも作ってて、
うちも母さんがよく……
弟と妹は、ジャムを入れた甘いやつが好きだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001520_JULLUS<tab>J-Just think of it as bread, all right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001520_JULLUS<tab>って俺はなにを……
ええと、その、つまり……これはパンだ。
怪しいものじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001530_JULLUS<tab>I should warn you, though, they're spicy─helps them keep longer, I assume. Too much for the children to handle, though.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001530_JULLUS<tab>ただ、長くもつようにしてくれたのか、香辛料が効いてるんだ。
実際、子どもには辛いようだったから、俺たちでもらってる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Interesting...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>これは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001550_JULLUS<tab>Interesting good or interesting...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001550_JULLUS<tab>やっぱり、辛かったか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't know much about taste. Not anymore. But I do feel a sensation in my mouth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>味なんて、今はもうよくわからない。
だが、これは……なにかあると……わかる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001570_JULLUS<tab>Is that a bad thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001570_JULLUS<tab>嫌な感じってことか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not necessarily.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>そうでもない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001590_JULLUS<tab>Heh, that's enough for me. I've heard it said that spices are more akin to fire than flavors. Perhaps that makes them easier to understand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001590_JULLUS<tab>……なら、よかった。
辛味は味というより痛みなんだって話を聞いたことがあるが、
だからこそ、わかりやすいのかもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001600_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Jullus. Getting acquainted with Zero, are we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001600_ALISAIE<tab>ああ、ユルスも戻ってきてたのね。
ゼロと一緒に休憩中？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001610_JULLUS<tab>Um...ah... I-I suppose I am...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001610_JULLUS<tab>あ、いや……まあ……そうだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001620_ALISAIE<tab>No harm in that. Acquaint away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001620_ALISAIE<tab>いいじゃない、楽しく話せたなら何よりよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, everyone is here. Excellent. Thank you all for your hard work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>やあ、ふたりとも、おつかれさま。
ゼロも手伝い助かったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001640_ALPHINAUD<tab>I've just finished up myself. Shall we go and find Estinien?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001640_ALPHINAUD<tab>私の方も一段落したところだ。
そろそろ、エスティニアンたちの様子を見に行こうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001650_GARLEANSOLDIER10320<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001650_GARLEANSOLDIER10320<tab>アルフィノ、アリゼー！
た、大変だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001660_JULLUS<tab>Report!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001660_JULLUS<tab>こちらユルス、どうかしたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001670_JULLUS<tab>Lost contact? When?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001670_JULLUS<tab>輸送部隊のひとつが、
ブロークングラスに戻ってきていない……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001680_JULLUS<tab>Voidsent─I'd bet my life on it. Understood. I'll investigate at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001680_JULLUS<tab>途中で妖異に襲われた可能性があるな。
了解した、すぐ救援に向かう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001690_JULLUS<tab>A unit transporting supplies has gone silent en route to Broken Glass. I will go and search for it. Stay here and keep watch, but be ready to answer my call.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001690_JULLUS<tab>聞いてのとおりだ。
この状況で駅の警備を手薄にするわけにもいかない。
俺が様子を見にいって、必要であれば応援を要請する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001700_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If it was voidsent, you'd be a fool to go alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001700_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……待て。
妖異の軍勢は手強いぞ。
様子見どころか、喰われるかもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001710_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They'll find you before you find your men. And then they'll devour you as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001710_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前、勝てる自信はあるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001720_JULLUS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001720_JULLUS<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001730_JULLUS<tab>Perhaps you're right. Perhaps I don't stand a chance. But I can't just abandon them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001730_JULLUS<tab>どんな奴が相手であろうと、同胞を……
ここで過ごす仲間を、もう失わせはしないッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I can't repay you for the bread if you're dead. I'll go.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>それなら私が行こう。
お前が死んだら、パンの借りが返せない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001750_JULLUS<tab>What!? No! I couldn't possibly ask you to do that!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001750_JULLUS<tab>駄目だ……！
そこまでお前を巻き込むつもりはない、
危険だからこそ、俺が行く。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001760_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I'm far better suited to dealing with voidsent. It makes sense.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001760_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>妖異の相手は、私の方が慣れている。
お前が行くよりも確実だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Or do you mean to say you'd rather I stay here because you can't protect this place on your own?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>それとも、私なしでは、
この拠点を護り抜く自信がないのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001780_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001780_JULLUS<tab>くっ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001785_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001785_JULLUS<tab>フー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001790_JULLUS<tab>Fine. Just...don't do anything stupid. Promise me!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001790_JULLUS<tab>……マズいと思ったら、すぐに退いてこい。
それだけは、約束だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001800_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Grrr... Damn these demons!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001800_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>クソッ、なんなんだよ、こいつら……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Return to the camp. Now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前たちはキャンプへ戻れ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001820_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Y-Yes, ma'am! Thank you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001820_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>えっ、あ、ありがとう……
どうかお気をつけて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001830_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Kindred... Why do you interfere?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001830_VOIDSENT10410<tab>オマエ、ワレラノ、同類ダナ？
ナゼ、邪魔スル？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001840_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Ah, of course. You sold your soul to feed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001840_VOIDSENT10410<tab>ソウカ。
オマエ、契約シテル？
エーテルヲ、メグンデモライ、魂ヲ売ッタナ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001845_VOIDSENT10410<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001845_VOIDSENT10410<tab>ギャアッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I have taken bread. But my soul is forever mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ああ、パンをもらった。
魂を売った覚えはないがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>How...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ハァ……ハァ……クソッ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001870_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>How big must the gate be for their like to come through...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001870_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>あんな奴まで来てるとは……
どれだけデカい門が開いたんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001880_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is this it, then...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001880_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>このあたりが限界、か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Just like that time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>これじゃ、同じだ……あのときと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When Light still shone upon the world... When the Contramemoria still raged...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>そう  あれは  世界にまだ光が射していたころ
メモリア戦争で戦っていたときだ――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001910_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Stand aside if you value your life.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001910_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>死にたくなければそこをどけ。
俺たちは、この先の村に用があるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001920_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>We're only after women and wine. Darkness can take the rest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001920_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>まぁ、酒と女を奪ったら、
残りは闇に堕としちまうけどなぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001930_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're not taking another step towards that village.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001930_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前たちを通すわけにはいかない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001940_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Stupid girl. You were warned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001940_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>だったら止めてみろ。
青二才が、俺たち全員を相手どれるものならな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001945_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001945_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>はぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>うっ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001955_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001955_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>でりゃっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001956_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>Gotcha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001956_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>がらあきだぜぇ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001957_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001957_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>がはっ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001958_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>And now we can get back to our business.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001958_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>邪魔者は排除したし、お楽しみといくかぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>くっ……う……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Get up... Get up, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>くそっ……くそぉっ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Too weak. I need...help...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>誰か……誰かいないのか……。
力を……貸してくれ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Someone...please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>頼む………助けてくれ…………！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The same mistakes, the same ends. Again and again. What should I...what could I have done?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>結局  また同じことの繰り返しだ
どうすればよかったんだろうな  私は――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>――なんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Who?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>――誰かいるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You... What are you doing here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前……は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002040_ALISAIE<tab>Y'shtola and Estinien had matters well in hand. So we went where we were needed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002040_ALISAIE<tab>あっちはある程度片付いたから、
ヤ・シュトラたちに任せてきたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you stand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>立てるかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're not finished yet, Zero. Let's fight together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ともに戦おう、ゼロ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We're a little late, but we've come to help you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>遅くなったが、助けにきた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...All right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……ああ、わかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will let it burn, this fire in my breast. Let it burn and rage and guide.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>熱い……胸の奥が……！
私はいくぞ、この衝動のままに！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You did well to find me out here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前たち、よくここがわかったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have Jullus to thank for that. He was quite worried when he called.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>ユルスから通信を受けてね。
できれば応援に向かってほしいと、頼まれたんだ。
とても心配している様子だったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>There would've been more casualties if not for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>危ないところを、よく助けてくれた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The people of Garlemald thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>みんなゼロに感謝してるだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No, if it was not for you and the others, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>いや……それを言うなら、私こそ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002110_ALISAIE<tab>Well, let's not fuss over details. We should return to Tertium─can you make it that far?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002110_ALISAIE<tab>まあいいわ。
とにかく、テルティウム駅の様子も見に戻らないと。
ゼロはまだ動ける？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I think so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ああ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002130_JULLUS<tab>Zero! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002130_JULLUS<tab>ゼロ、大丈夫か……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Well enough. No voidsent struck here, did they?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>なんとかな。
この様子だと、こちらに妖異は現れなかったか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002150_JULLUS<tab>No, and there weren't any more casualties thanks to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002150_JULLUS<tab>ああ。
おかげさまで負傷者はなしだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>う……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What are you doing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>何の、つもりだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002180_JULLUS<tab>You'll have no debts to repay, if that's what you're worried about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002180_JULLUS<tab>安心しろ、また貸しにしたいわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002190_JULLUS<tab>If anything, I owe you a week's worth of buuz.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002190_JULLUS<tab>パンひとつの対価を、もらいすぎたからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……フン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002210_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Hah hah hah! All shall cower before the might of Archfiend Cagnazzo!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002210_WATERMONOLITH<tab>ゴルベーザ四天王  水のカイナッツォ！
クカカカカ  楽しませてもらうぜ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002220_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Tell me one thing, Cagnazzo.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002220_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ゴルベーザ四天王の、カイナッツォと名乗ったな。
お前には聞きたいことがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>A dragon of our world crossed over into yours long ago, but I have felt her presence here again. What is the meaning of this?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>遠い昔にお前の世界へと渡った竜が、
「こちら側」へ帰ってきたのを感じた。
知っていることがあれば教えてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002240_WATERMONOLITH<tab>I daresay what you felt...was this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002240_WATERMONOLITH<tab>クカカカカ……
お前が感じたのは、これの気配じゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002250_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>By the Sisters...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002250_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>それは……アジュダヤの……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002260_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You... What have you done to Azdaja!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002260_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>お前たち、やはり彼女を……！
アジュダヤに何をしたッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002270_WATERMONOLITH<tab>If you want answers, you'll have to get them from Lord Golbez.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002270_WATERMONOLITH<tab>クカカ！
竜について知りたきゃ、
ゴルベーザ様に直接問いただせばいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002280_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Assuming you've the strength to face him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002280_WATERMONOLITH<tab>できるなら、なァ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002290_WATERMONOLITH<tab>A pity I will not see the plan to fruition, but my part is done. And to fade with the thrill of battle in my heart makes it all the more worthwhile...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002290_WATERMONOLITH<tab>これで、俺の役目は終わった。
計画の完遂を見届けられねぇのは、ちっとばかり残念だが、
最期に楽しませてもらったから良しとするか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002300_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>No, wait! Where is she!? Where is my sister!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002300_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>待て……待ってくれ！
姉さんはどこにいるんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002310_WATERMONOLITH<tab>At long last, I go to join the great flow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002310_WATERMONOLITH<tab>ひと足先に、命の巡りへと還らせてもらうぜ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002320_YSHTOLA<tab>By the gate's closing, there can be no doubt that he was the one who opened it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002320_YSHTOLA<tab>ここのゲートは、
カイナッツォが開いたものだったのね。
だから、術者の死によって消滅した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002330_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Oh, Azdaja... I prayed we might meet once more...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002330_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>姉さん……
ようやく会えると思ったのに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002340_ESTINIEN<tab>She is likely still in the void. Take heart─we will find her yet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002340_ESTINIEN<tab>お前が感じたのが、その眼の気配だったなら、
本体はまだ、あちらの世界にいるんだろう。
だったら探しに行けばいい……何度だってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So, what now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>さて、これからどうする？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you discuss how to proceed with your search, I would excuse myself to look around. There may be salvage that we could use at the camp.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>……私たちは、この集落を見て回りたい。
復興の役に立つ物資がありそうなのでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002370_ALISAIE<tab>In that case, I'll patrol the area for more voidsent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002370_ALISAIE<tab>それなら私は、妖異の残党がいないか、
見回りをしてくるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well, let us take a moment to consider our options.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>私たちも、まずは現状の確認をしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Is Vrtra not back yet?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002390_ALISAIE<tab>ヴリトラは……まだ来てないようね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>My apologies for the delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>待たせてすまない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002410_ESTINIEN<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002410_ESTINIEN<tab>……もういいんだな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I am. As distressing as this turn of events was, the eye itself gives me cause to hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ああ。
姉さんには会えなかったが、眼を取り戻すことができた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>While it is no longer possessed of Azdaja's will, it may yet lead us to her.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>意思の残滓すら残されていないが、
それでも、ようやく手にした姉さんへの手がかりだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Were it not for your encouragement, I would never have dared to embark on my search, much less come this far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>これまでのように立ち止まり続けていたら、
こんな成果は得られなかっただろう。
君たちが背中を押してくれたから、辿りつけたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002450_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I will not lose faith. I will find my sister, wheresoever she may be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002450_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>だから、恐れず進み続けよう。
もう一度向かうんだ、姉さんの待つヴォイドへ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>We'll return the eye to her together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>早く探し出して、片眼を返してやらないとな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>Though tainted, the eye has not fully succumbed to Darkness. Azdaja herself may have been able to resist its influence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>この眼の有するエーテルは、
多少の影響を受けているけれど、完全に闇に染まってはいない。
本体だって、妖異にならずに持ちこたえているかもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Well, as much as we'd love to take part in your next foray, we can't abandon our efforts here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002480_ALISAIE<tab>それじゃあ私たちも、って言いたいところだけど、
ガレマルドのこと、投げ出しては行けないわ。
自分で決めたことだものね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We'll need to keep a close watch in case the voidgate opens again as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>再びヴォイドゲートが開かれる可能性がある以上、
こちらに残って警戒しておく者も必要だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though should it prove safe to do so, I have some ideas for how we might put this village to use.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>私たちはガレマルドの地で、復興に向かい始めた人々を護る。
この隠れ里についても、妖異たちの動向を見つつ、
有効活用していければと思っているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>Do what you must. We will manage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>ああ、それでいい。
ヴォイドの方については、俺たちに任せておけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002520_YSHTOLA<tab>To free Azdaja, I expect we will have to deal with Golbez once and for all─after which you may undertake your work without worry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002520_YSHTOLA<tab>アジュダヤをゴルベーザたちから解放できれば、
彼らがこちらへのゲートを開けることもなくなるはず。
安心して復興を目指せるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>We look forward to the glad tidings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>わかった。
朗報が届くのを待っているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002540_ALISAIE<tab>You'll take good care of everyone, won't you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002540_ALISAIE<tab>ゼロ。
この人たちのこと、頼んだわよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What? Why do you ask me this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>なぜ私に？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Because comrades look out for one another, and I can't think of anyone more qualified to keep them safe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002560_ALISAIE<tab>あなたも一緒に、第十三世界に行くんでしょう？
だったら仲間として……ね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>True. I will do no less than I've promised.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……契約したとおり、同行はする。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>If our respective plans are settled, then let us head back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>さあ、ひとまずふもとまで戻ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If everyone is ready, then let us depart for Alzadaal's Legacy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>皆、準備はいいな。
それでは、封宝の間からヴォイドへ向かおう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What was that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>今の光はいったい……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>A deluge of aether. The mark of a terrible magick.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>エーテルの奔流……！
何か、とてつもなく大きな魔法が発動したみたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002620_ESTINIEN<tab>It wasn't far from here. Let's go!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002620_ESTINIEN<tab>そう遠くはなかったようだ。
現地に向かって、確かめるぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002630_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Hey, you! Stop! If you're thinking of taking to sea─don't!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002630_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>あ、あんたら、ちょっと待ちな！
海には今、近づかねぇ方がいい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002640_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What has happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002640_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>何があった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002650_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>We were out working our nets when a light suddenly shot up over Bhaflau Isle with a boom!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002650_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>バフラウ島の辺りから、突然光の柱が昇ったかと思ったら、
とてつもねぇ爆発音が響いたんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002660_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>A massive fiend then took to the skies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002660_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>それだけじゃねぇ！
島があった辺りから、巨大な化け物が飛び出してきてよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002670_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Another blasphemy, we feared─but we didn't linger to find out.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002670_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>俺は、また終末の獣が現れたんじゃねぇかと思って、
慌てて逃げてきたってわけだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Did you see where it was headed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>その化け物は、どこへ向かった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002690_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Can't say for sure, but it looked like it was northward bound.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002690_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>わからねぇ。
この島の北側の方に飛んでったっきり、
見えなくなっちまった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002700_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I see... Our thanks for the warning, and do not let us keep you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002700_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>そうか、わかった。
貴重な情報、感謝する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Bhaflau Isle is connected to Alzadaal's Legacy. This cannot be a coincidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>バフラウ島というのは、海底遺跡に繋がっていた小島だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002720_YSHTOLA<tab>In response to Cagnazzo's defeat, they have come for our gate...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002720_YSHTOLA<tab>私たちの使うゲートが狙われた……？
カイナッツォの件の直後だもの、妖異の関与もあり得るわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002730_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So it seems. I would ascertain the situation at the vault, but the fiend must be dealt with ere people come to harm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002730_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ああ……。
急ぎ宝物殿に向かいたいところだが、
上陸した化け物を捨て置くわけにもいかない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002740_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I shall assume my dragon form and seek it out at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002740_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>私の「本体」で空から捜索を試みよう。
化け物の正体が何であるにせよ、それがもっとも……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>Wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>落ち着け。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002760_ESTINIEN<tab>You heard the fisherman. A blasphemy, they called it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002760_ESTINIEN<tab>さっき逃げてった奴の言葉を忘れたのか？
終末の獣がまた現れたかもしれないと、怯えていただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002770_ESTINIEN<tab>If another flying creature were sighted now, others will assume the worst, and panic will spread. This is not the way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002770_ESTINIEN<tab>そんな中で天竜が空を舞えば、いよいよ誤解を招きかねん。
太守なら、こういうときこそ宮殿でどんと構えていろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see to the fiend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>化け物の行方は自分が追う

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can work together on this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>手分けをすれば、対応できるはず

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>...You are right, Estinien.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>……すまない、恩に着る。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I will gather my soldiers and search the isle for casualties.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ならば私はメーガドゥータ宮に戻って、
星戦士たちとともに、先の爆発に巻き込まれた者がいないか、
被害状況を確認しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002800_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As you wish, the fiend is yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002800_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>君には、提案どおり、
島の北側に向かったという化け物を捜索してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002810_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>The fiend, I leave to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002810_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>君には、島の北側に向かったという化け物を、
捜索してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002820_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>The hunt will go more swiftly with help. Zero, might I prevail upon you to accompany <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002820_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>捜索には人手がいる。
ゼロにも補佐を頼みたいところだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……いいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>Then Estinien and I will make for Alzadaal's Legacy and secure the gate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>ゼロがそちらに回ってくれるなら、
私とエスティニアンで、宝物殿の様子を調べてくるわ。
ヴォイドゲートの状態を確認しておきたいもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Stay on your guard. The enemy is clever and will have anticipated our response.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>是非、頼む。
ほかの化け物が出てこないともかぎらないのだ、
十分に注意してくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Be safe, my friends, and may the Sisters guide your steps.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>では、のちほどまたメーガドゥータ宮で。
皆、必ず無事に戻ってきてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Hello? Can you hear me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラの声-)聞こえる？
ヤ・シュトラよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)We were too late. The vault has been destroyed, the alchemical furnace with it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラの声-)……やられたわ。
封宝の間のヴォイドゲートは、宝物殿ごと破壊されていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)This was their true objective─to deny us entry into the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラの声-)きっとこれが、ゴルベーザの本当の狙いだったのよ。
私たちから、第十三世界へと渡る手段を奪うことがね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Cagnazzo and Azdaja's eye were a diversion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラの声-)カイナッツォは、陽動だった。
アジュダヤの眼を使って私たちをおびき寄せ、
命がけで時間を稼いだのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)A means to detain us in Garlemald while they went to work here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラの声-)別働隊が宝物殿に侵入し、
私たちのゲートを破壊するための時間をね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)To reduce the vault to rubble... That which you hunt is no ordinary foe. Have care.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラの声-)気をつけて、あなたが追っているのは、
宝物殿を完全に破壊し、文字どおり海底に沈めたほどの強敵よ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002930_FIREMONOLITH<tab>(-???-)Such an exquisite sight... A canvas of vibrant colors. As was our world too, once...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002930_FIREMONOLITH<tab>(-？？？？-)美しい光景だ……。
我らの世界も、昔はこのように色づいていた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>One of Golbez's champions, I presume.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ゴルベーザ四天王か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you the one who destroyed the treasure vault?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>宝物殿を破壊したのはお前か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002940_FIREMONOLITH<tab>I am. Rubicante, the archfiend of fire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002940_FIREMONOLITH<tab>いかにも。
私はゴルベーザ四天王が一角、ルビカンテ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002950_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A monster in flesh, yet in spirit I remain a man. A prisoner of the past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002950_FIREMONOLITH<tab>かような異形となり果てても、
いまだに悪鬼に堕ちきれぬ、無様な男よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002960_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Such tears I wept when Darkness consumed the world. Until Lord Golbez came and spoke of salvation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002960_FIREMONOLITH<tab>闇に沈んだ世界にて、
ただ昔日を想い嘆いていた私の前に、あの御方が現れ、
いまだ救えるものが遺されているのだと示してくださった……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002970_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Thus do I walk proudly at his side, to see his dream fulfilled.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002970_FIREMONOLITH<tab>ゆえに私はゴルベーザ様の右腕となり、
その大業を成すために生きてきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002980_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Your heart is pure. For benevolent cause you seek the dragon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002980_FIREMONOLITH<tab>フム……やはり貴殿からは、邪なものを感じない。
かの竜を求めるのも、善なる想いゆえなのであろうな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002990_FIREMONOLITH<tab>But I cannot allow you to have it─cannot allow you to interfere. If you would continue, then there is but one recourse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002990_FIREMONOLITH<tab>が、渡すわけにはゆかぬ！
貴殿らの行いが、存在が、大業の妨げとなるゆえに……！
何に代えても排除させてもらうとしよう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003000_FIREMONOLITH<tab>I shall await you at the summit. Come, mortal! Come and weigh your righteousness against mine!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003000_FIREMONOLITH<tab>山頂にて待つ。
異界の勇士よ、正々堂々と勝負しようではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003010_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You stayed the course─as I knew you would. As too will I. Come!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003010_FIREMONOLITH<tab>よくぞ来た  異界の勇士よ
全力でかかってくるがいい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It seems I was a step too slow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ひと足遅かったか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003030_FIREMONOLITH<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003030_FIREMONOLITH<tab>はー……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003040_FIREMONOLITH<tab>To defeat all of us archfiends... You are strong indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003040_FIREMONOLITH<tab>これが、四天王を討ち取ってきた力か……見事だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What is it that Golbez seeks?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ゴルベーザの目的はなんだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why do you fight? What is it that you wish to save?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前は何を救おうとしている？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003050_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You would know my lord's true purpose?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003050_FIREMONOLITH<tab>あの御方の目的を知りたいと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003060_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Very well. The knowledge will not change the outcome. Listen, then, and learn how all began...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003060_FIREMONOLITH<tab>いいだろう。
どの道、もはや貴殿らに為すすべはなし。
我らの始まりを、知るがよい……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003070_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You would know your enemy's heart?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003070_FIREMONOLITH<tab>フッ……相対した敵の宿願を、知ろうとするか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003080_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Very well. It bleeds more than you can ever understand, but I will speak, and you will listen, and learn how all began...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003080_FIREMONOLITH<tab>ならば教えてやろう。
我らの始まりを……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>How long has it been since the world was undone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>この世界が闇に沈んで幾星霜……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Since Light and life gave way to Darkness and undeath. Since we were reduced to beasts befouled, squabbling over what scant aether remains...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>あれほど美しかった世界は混沌と化し、
生きとし生けるものは心まで醜い異形へと成り果て、
僅かばかりのエーテルを奪い合っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you are different. You remember who you were, and the paradise for which you fought.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>だが、お前たちは違う。
己がどのような人間であったか、何のために戦っていたのか、
それを忘れてはいないはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>That world will never be ours again. But we need not suffer in this purgatory of death and rebirth forever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>この世界を在りし日の姿に戻すことは、もはや叶わぬ。
だが、「止まった命」を終わらせ、
我らを生命へと回帰させることはできよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003130_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Join me, and together we shall seek the promised land!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003130_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>そのために、向かうのだ。
新天地へと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003140_FIREMONOLITH<tab>There is no hope─no freedom from the wheel. You speak a fantasy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003140_FIREMONOLITH<tab>馬鹿げたことを……。
叶いもしない希望を、見せてくれるな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003150_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I speak truth. The Ascians' revelation. There are other worlds than this. Ours is but one of fourteen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003150_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>決して世迷言ではない。
アシエンなる者によれば、我らの世界とは別に、
13の世界が存在しているという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003160_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>There is no greater proof than the whispers we hear─born of a neighboring reality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003160_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>時折ささやきかけてくる、我らをたぶらかさんとする呼び声は、
隣り合った世界からの干渉だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003170_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A reality to which we may journey if we can but break down the barrier that divides us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003170_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>そして、「向こう側」と「こちら側」を隔てているもの……
次元の壁を破壊することで、我らは世界を渡ることが可能となる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003180_WATERMONOLITH<tab>You meant it, then? We will take this world as our own?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003180_WATERMONOLITH<tab>つまりは、なんだァ……？
あちらさんに押し入って、世界まるごと奪おうってわけか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003190_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Gahahaha! Count me in!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003190_WATERMONOLITH<tab>クカカカカ！
おもしろそうじゃねぇか、俺は乗ったぜ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003200_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>In return for your strength, I offer you opportunity to pursue your own ends in service to a greater cause...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003200_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>お前たちはお前たちの目的のため、我が計画を使うがよい。
私は私の宿願のため、お前たちの力を利用する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003210_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A glorious kingdom of Light, wherein all may know death's sweet embrace!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003210_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>我は闇の魔王となりて、光射す世界を奪おう！
すべての命に、終わりという名の救済を与えるために……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003220_FIREMONOLITH<tab>...And thus did we begin our great work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003220_FIREMONOLITH<tab>……そうして、我らの計画がはじまったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You intend to forsake the Thirteenth and conquer the Source?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>つまり、お前たちは第十三世界を捨て、
この世界を奪うつもりなのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003240_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Just so. Our home is a lost cause, our only choice to begin anew.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003240_FIREMONOLITH<tab>いかにも……。
終わった世界を今さらどうこうすることはできない。
だが、異なる世界を手にすれば状況は変わる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003250_FIREMONOLITH<tab>In this world, where we may reclaim our mortality.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003250_FIREMONOLITH<tab>我らは再び、尊厳ある生命に戻るのだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You served Golbez of your own volition...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前は、己の意思でゴルベーザに従っていたんだな。
力によって服従を強いられたわけでもなく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003270_FIREMONOLITH<tab>As atonement for my failures. I tried to be a hero. Tried to stop the war...but I could not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003270_FIREMONOLITH<tab>そうだ、それが私にとっての贖罪なのだ。
英雄たらんと志しながらも叶わず、
戦を止めることすらできなかった自分への罰よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So in turn you wage another?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>戦……メモリア戦争を止めようとしていたのか？
それなのに、なぜ新たな戦いを引き起こそうとする？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003290_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A means to a final end. The wheel of depravity must be broken.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003290_FIREMONOLITH<tab>惨劇を伴ってでも、誰かが止めねばならないからだ。
あの世界の……我らの終わりなき堕落を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003300_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Even the most exalted succumb. We eat and eat and deepen the stain upon our souls, until only the hunger remains. Is this to be our fate for all eternity?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003300_FIREMONOLITH<tab>高潔であろうとし、今なおそれを求めながら、
餓えるままに喰らい、混ざり、獣へと堕ちていく。
魂が冒涜され続け、どうして耐えられる……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...I don't know. About this and a great many things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……わからないな、私には。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003320_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But I do know that it's wrong to damn another to save yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003320_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だが、お前たちが救済を謳いながら、
別の誰かの世界を奪おうとしているのは気に食わない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not everything need be a trade. This I learned from the people of this world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>こっちで出会ったアルフィノやアリゼー、ユルスたちは、
強さでも、契約でもないもので繋がっていた。
互いのために頑張っていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Even without a contract, without any expectation of personal gain, they labor for one another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>こいつだって、必要もないのに、私を助けに駆けつけたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I didn't understand it at first─and perhaps I still don't. But if I'm to achieve something, I'd rather do it their way. Else I am already a hunger-maddened beast.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>誰かと何かを成し遂げるなら、そういうことの方がいい。
お前たちとゴルベーザは……
結局、腹をすかせた獣の集まりじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003360_FIREMONOLITH<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003360_FIREMONOLITH<tab>クク、フフ、ハハハ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003370_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Perhaps we have indeed surrendered to the hunger after a fashion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003370_FIREMONOLITH<tab>ならば、止めてみせろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003380_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Make for our moon. There you will find both Lord Golbez and your dragon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003380_FIREMONOLITH<tab>我らが世界の闇に浮かぶ月を目指すがいい。
そこにお前たちが求める竜と、あの御方がいる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why are you telling us this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>どうしてそれを自分たちに教える？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you betraying Golbez?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ゴルベーザを裏切る気か

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003390_FIREMONOLITH<tab>To be so viciously slandered... Pride demands I prove my virtue at the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003390_FIREMONOLITH<tab>なに……。
そうまで誹られては、最期にひとつ、
まことの高潔を為したかっただけのこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003400_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Never. Our triumph is at hand, and the knowledge will avail you naught.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003400_FIREMONOLITH<tab>あの御方を裏切るつもりは毛頭ない。
どの道、大願は成就する……もはや止められはしない。
だからこそ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003410_FIREMONOLITH<tab>But to be so viciously slandered... Pride demands I prove my virtue at the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003410_FIREMONOLITH<tab>誹られたままで果てず、最期にひとつ、
まことの高潔を為したかっただけのこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003420_FIREMONOLITH<tab>And perhaps your own will resonate with his...and draw forth that singular jewel which abides deep within his heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003420_FIREMONOLITH<tab>加えて、貴殿らならばあるいは、
あの御方の想いを引き出せるのではないか、とな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003430_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A desire which lies beyond his quest to free us from our purgatory. A desire...all his own...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003430_FIREMONOLITH<tab>止まった命を終わらせるという大義名分ではなく、
ゴルベーザ様だけが抱えてきた、真なる想いを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank goodness you're both all right.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>おかえりなさい。
ひとまず無事に合流できてよかったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Unfortunately, we have nothing further to report apart from the loss of the gate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>こちらの状況は、さっき伝えたとおりよ。
ヴォイドゲートは宝物殿ごと破壊されていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003460_YSHTOLA<tab>But tell us─how did you fare on the mountain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003460_YSHTOLA<tab>それで、あなたたちの方はどうだった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>Golbez aspires to deliver voidsent unto the Source...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>ゴルベーザの目的は、
すべての妖異を原初世界へと強制的に転移させ、
死すべき定めに戻すこと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003480_YSHTOLA<tab>Where they may die and return to the Lifestream to be reborn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003480_YSHTOLA<tab>さらに言えば、こちら側の星海に還り、
また新たな命として生まれなおしたいということかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003490_ESTINIEN<tab>Far be it from me to deny them, but the cost to our people would be beyond unconscionable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003490_ESTINIEN<tab>その願望をとやかく言うつもりはないが、
それで原初世界の住民に被害が出るなら、
「どうぞ」とは言い難いな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003500_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Voidsent themselves are inherently dangerous, never mind the chaos sure to follow should the barrier 'twixt our worlds be shattered. 'Twould be naught less than a calamity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003500_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ……。
妖異の力そのものも脅威だけれど、世界の壁を壊すのだもの、
霊災に匹敵する事態が起こりかねないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can't let that happen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>そんなことはさせない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How can we prevent this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>防ぐ方法はあるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003510_YSHTOLA<tab>Certainly not. That said, our task has been rendered rather difficult.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003510_YSHTOLA<tab>そうね。
そのためには、ゴルベーザを止めるしかないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003520_YSHTOLA<tab>The simplest way would, of course, be to strike at Golbez himself. That said, our task has been rendered rather difficult.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003520_YSHTOLA<tab>首謀者である、ゴルベーザを止めるのが、
もっとも確実な方法でしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003530_VRITRA<tab>Indeed... Rubicante hath deprived us of a means to cross into the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003530_VRITRA<tab>しかし、ルビカンテの策により、
我々がヴォイドへと渡る方法は失われてしまった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>Cagnazzo's feint. That was doubtless what he meant when he said his part was done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>……問題はやはりそこね。
カイナッツォが最期に口にしていた、
「俺の役目は終わった」とは、まさにそのことだったんだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003550_ESTINIEN<tab>Golbez sacrificed two archfiends just to stop us. He must need more time to break the barrier to our world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003550_ESTINIEN<tab>四天王を犠牲にしてまで俺たちの介入を阻んだということは、
ゴルベーザが世界の壁を破壊できるようになるまで、
まだ多少の時間はあるはずだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003560_VRITRA<tab>Then the days ahead will be critical. We must find a way back to the Thirteenth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003560_VRITRA<tab>ゴルベーザが準備を完了させるのが先か、
私たちが第十三世界に渡る方法を、再び得るのが先か。
その競争ということになるな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>We could employ another Atomos, but that approach would only be viable if we found another planar fissure. An unlikely prospect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>クラックを見つければ、
もう一度、人工アトモスを使えるのだけど、
そう都合よくいくとはかぎらないものね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>Better we explore other avenues.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>別の手法も、検討してみた方がいいか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>If you will excuse my absence, I shall return to Sharlayan to look for information.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>少し時間をもらっていいかしら。
オールド・シャーレアンに戻って、調べものをしてきたいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003600_VRITRA<tab>By all means. Meanwhile, I shall seek the counsel of our alchemists.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003600_VRITRA<tab>ああ、もちろんだ。
こちらも、アトモスの製造にあたった錬金術師たちに、
改めて意見を募ってみるとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>Time is of the essence, so─wish me luck.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>じゃあ、行ってくるわ。
できるだけ早急に成果が出せるよう、尽力するつもりよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>I'm no scholar. I'll find another way to keep myself busy here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>ふむ……。
ヤ・シュトラを手伝えるわけでもなし、
俺たちの出番は先になりそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Y'shtola alone will be more a match for those tomes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ヤ・シュトラを信じて待とう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How about a little training to keep your lance arm honed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>今のうちに鍛えなおそう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003625_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003625_ESTINIEN<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>I don't doubt it. She's a veritable “Researcher of Light.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>ああ、そうだな。
俺だって、そこはまったく疑っちゃいないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>Heh, rest assured I never shirk my training. I will be ready for whatever awaits.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>そうだな。
方法が見つかれば、敵の拠点に乗り込むことになる。
激戦になることは間違いない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003650_VRITRA<tab>Zero. May we call upon thee when next we venture unto the Thirteenth?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003650_VRITRA<tab>ゼロ、引き続き君にも、
第十三世界に同行してもらえると考えていいだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. And in case you're wondering, I won't ask for further payment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……ああ。
そのためにさらなるエーテルをよこせと言うつもりもない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will go for myself. To try and understand why I spoke the words I said to Rubicante...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私は、お前たちと行くことで確かめたいんだ。
自分がルビカンテに語ったこと……
どうしてあんな考えが浮かんだのかを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And the fire I felt within when you all came to my aid in Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前たちが助けにきたときに、胸の奥で感じた熱。
その正体をな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>While our esteemed sorceress battles her tomes, let us see to our own affairs.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>だったら、魔女殿が奮闘してくれている間に、
それぞれ身支度を整えておくとするか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003700_VRITRA<tab>I will not fail you again, Sister...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003700_VRITRA<tab>そうとも、次こそは必ず……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Cagnazzo and Rubicante have joined with the great flow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>……カイナッツォとルビカンテは、命の巡りへと戻ったか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>In this world, 'tis the ravenous who are useful. And few were as ravenous as they.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>この世界では、欲深き者ほど役に立つ。
奴らは多くを求め、ゆえにこそ、
課せられた役割をよくこなしてくれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003730_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You were fine pawns, my archfiends, and you have played your parts to perfection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003730_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>スカルミリョーネ、バルバリシア、
カイナッツォ、ルビカンテ……
いずれも実に優秀な駒であったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But with the goal in sight, I need no minions to do my bidding.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>しかし、我が計画の成就が目前に迫った今、
もはや弱者を従える必要もない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Hereon, I shall walk alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>ここから先は、私ひとりで進もう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>At long, long last...the end draws nigh.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>幾星霜の時を経て、ようやくここまで来た。
これで終わりを迎えることができる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003770_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>The end to life on that star. And the end to my suffering...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003770_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>あの星の命も、我が苦しみも……。
